section.p: You leave the clearing carefully. Grindel lets you go unmolested, fixing you with a stare through slitted eyes. You grab Misgee and drag him kicking and screaming to face Grindel.
'No!' howls Misgee unhappily. 'It's all a trick! The vile beast just wants to get you off guard!'
Grindel leans on his tree trunk, gazing impassively at the sky. 'Bah!' he mutters.
